title: Personalized Learning Path for Computer Vision Certification
description: This personalized learning path is designed for individuals with some familiarity with basic computer vision concepts who prefer auditory learning and aim to achieve certification in the field. The path focuses on key theoretical and practical aspects of computer vision to prepare you for certification exams.

milestones.title: Introduction to Computer Vision Fundamentals
milestones.description: Gain a solid understanding of basic computer vision concepts, including image processing, feature extraction, and object detection.

resources.title: Podcast: Introduction to Computer Vision Basics

milestones.title: Exploring Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
milestones.description: Dive deeper into CNNs, a key technology in computer vision, and learn how they are used for image classification and object recognition.

milestones.title: Hands-On Project: Object Detection and Localization
milestones.description: Apply your knowledge by working on a project focused on object detection and localization using popular computer vision libraries.

resources.title: Podcast Series: Real-World Applications of Object Detection

prerequisites: Some familiarity with basic computer vision concepts
